channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Residents and business dumpage, 13th July
item.description:
As above - disgusting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Colomb Street, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Elmcourt Road SE27 School Street signage., 13th July
item.description:
Elmcourt Road SE27 School Street signage. This report covers two signs that have been graffiti tagged so the times of this School Street can not be seen. Graffiti is above 6ft ie this is above the height that your ‘graffiti contractor’ works. Sign 1) Outside 51 Lovelace Road. Sign 2) on Elmcourt Road at the junction with Thurlow Park Road. Please forward fixmystreet.com report to your contractor for picture – shows Lovelace Rd sign and if zoom in can also see Elmcourt Rd sign.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lovelace Road, Tulse Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 47 Callcott Road NW16 7EE, 13th July
item.description:
3 cars has blocked the road and stopped traffic. People from 3 cars exchanged same canisters. The person with a canister box sat in a blue BMW reg no HT22HRC and in seconds threw away 2 canisters on the road through a passenger window. I have a video of them doing it.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Callcott Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pickhurst Green - Litter on green, 13th July
item.description:
Litter on Pickhurst Green needs removing, various items where pin is on map (W3W: I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///slurs.wage.laptop https://w3w.co/slurs.wage.laptop Numerous other pieces scattered over green. Please can you clear all of it on Monday.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickhurst Lane, West Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
